絧字的基本解释

絧
tōng
缓而直通貌。

絧
tóng
古书上说的一种布。

絧
dòng
〔鸿絧〕a.相连的样子；b.直弛；c.深远。

絧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dòng］
［《廣韻》徒弄切，去送，定。］
鸿絧，相连貌。《文选·扬雄〈羽猎赋〉》：“徽車輕武，鴻絧緁獵。”李善注：“鴻絧，相連貌也。”一说直驰貌。见《汉书·扬雄传上》颜师古注。

絧字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絧； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页923第07
【廣韻】【正韻】徒紅切【集韻】【韻會】徒東切，?音同。布名。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒弄切，音洞。【前漢·揚雄傳】鴻絧緁獵。【註】鴻絧，直馳貌。【文選·李善註】鴻絧，相連貌。　又【集韻】【類篇】?他東切，音通。緩而直通貌。

絧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絧字的起名意思

暂无。

絧
Basic explanation of words
絧
tōng
Slowly and straight to the appearance.
絧
tóng
A kind of cloth mentioned in ancient books.
絧
dòng
〔Hong絧〕 a. Connected appearance; b. Straight relaxation; c. Profound.
絧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dòng］
["Guangyun" just cut it, send it off, set it. ]
Hong 絧, connected appearance. "Selected Works·Yangxiong "Feather Hunting Fu"": "The emblem of the car is light and martial, and the red 絧絧緁 hunting." Li Shan's note: "The red 絧 is connected to the appearance." When it comes to straight appearance. See Yan Shigu's Note in "The Book of Han·The Story of Yang Xiong".
絧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絧; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 923 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Red Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Dong cut with the same sound? Cloth name.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? It’s just to cut, the sound hole. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Hong 絧緁緁hunting. [Note] Hong 絧, straight ahead. [Selected Works·Li Shan's Note] Hong 絧, connected appearance.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? He cuts the East, the sound is good. Slowly and straight to the appearance.
